section.title: Cache and Data Maintenance
section.para:
Thumbnails and other cached data can be maintained from the dialog accessible by selecting
Edit Cache maintenance
.

section.title: Geeqie thumbnail and sim. cache
section.para: The utilities listed here operate on the Geeqie caching mechanism. This also includes the data cached for the search and find duplicates utilities.

listitem.para: Removes thumbnails, sim. files, and data for which the source image is no longer present, or has been modified since the thumbnail was generated.
Removes all thumbnails, sim. files, and data stored in the designated folder.

section.title: Shared thumbnail cache
section.para: The utilities listed here operate on the shared thumbnail mechanism.

listitem.para: Removes thumbnails for which the source image is no longer present, or has been modified since the thumbnail was generated.
Removes all thumbnails stored in the designated folder.

section.title: Create thumbnails
section.para: This utility will render thumbnails using the current thumbnail caching mechanism, as determined in Preferences .

listitem.para: Pre-render thumbnails for a specific folder, the utility has the following options:
Enable to include all images contained in the subfolders of folder.

term.guilabel: Store thumbnails local to source images

listitem.para: The generated thumbnails will be stored local to the source images, if you have the permissions to write to the folder containing the images.

section.title: Create file similarity cache
section.para:
Some file operations, such as search and find duplicates , are speeded up if similarity data files for the images have been created. This utility will create sim. files recursively under the specified folder.
The sim. files contain some or all of the following fields:
Dimensions
width x height
Date
Exif date in time_t format
checksum
MD5sum 32 character ascii text digest
SimilarityGrid
[32 x 32] = 3072 bytes of data (1024 pixels in RGB format, 1 pixel is 24bits)

section.title: Metadata
section.para: This utility operates on the data store for Metadata located in the folder: $HOME/.local/share/Geeqie/metadata

listitem.para: Removes keywords and comments for which the source image is no longer present.

section.title: Background Cache Maintenance
section.para: This facility will run the command line program described below as a stand-alone background job.

section.title: Command line program
section.para:
Geeqie can be run as a command line program: geeqie --cache-maintenance <path to images>. It will recursively remove orphaned thumbnails and .sim files, and create thumbnails and similarity data for all images found.
It may also be called from cron or anacron thus enabling automatic updating of the cached data for all your images.
